title: CANMAT Task Force Recommendations for the Use of Ketamine
itunes:title: CANMAT Task Force Recommendations for the Use of Ketamine
description:
Can we use ketamine as a maintenance treatment for MDD?
In this episode, Dr. Phelps discusses CANMAT’s recommendations for the use of ketamine for MDD.

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D.
Host: Jessica Diaz, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 35
  • The Canadian Network for Mood and Anxiety Treatments (CANMAT) Task Force Recommendations for the Use of Racemic Ketamine in Adults With Major Depressive Disorder
